1.content: Research Google Sheets API integration requirements
1.details: 1. Investigate Google Sheets API v4 for reading/writing data. 2. Research authentication methods (OAuth2, service accounts). 3. Identify required scopes and permissions. 4. Document rate limits and best practices for bulk operations.

2.details: 1. Create database schema for batch jobs and bulk operations. 2. Design API endpoints for bulk content generation. 3. Implement queue system for managing bulk requests. 4. Add progress tracking and status monitoring. 5. Create cost optimization logic (batch API calls, caching, rate limiting).

3.details: 1. Implement Google Sheets API client. 2. Create service for reading idea rows from sheets. 3. Add validation and data transformation logic. 4. Implement error handling for API failures. 5. Add webhook support for sheet updates.

4.details: 1. Create batch processing pipeline for multiple ideas. 2. Implement parallel audio/video generation with rate limiting. 3. Add smart batching to optimize API costs. 4. Create progress monitoring and real-time updates. 5. Implement failed job retry logic.

5.content: Create web interface for bulk operations
5.details: 1. Build Google Sheets connection interface. 2. Create bulk job creation and management UI. 3. Add progress tracking dashboard. 4. Implement cost estimation and optimization settings. 5. Create job history and analytics views.

6.details: 1. Add intelligent batching to reduce API calls. 2. Implement caching for repeated content. 3. Create priority queues for different cost tiers. 4. Add cost monitoring and alerts. 5. Create usage analytics and reporting.

7.details: 1. Create comprehensive test suite for bulk operations. 2. Test Google Sheets integration with various sheet formats. 3. Validate cost optimization algorithms. 4. Create user documentation for bulk features. 5. Add API documentation for new endpoints.
